page.title: 03The Village of Cuxton (2)
page.content: anniversary of its first{Rector.}On the edge of the village is a small {paint factory}which employs a number of local people. The main London to Dover railway line passes just to the north of the village. "What are people currently talking & thinking about ?" When asked, the people of the village icluded a number of topics. Their chief hope was for an improvement in community life. Many were concerned with the increase in crime, especially burglaries, vandalism & safety of their children. A Neighbourhood Watch scheme is to be introduced. Some were worried about the effect of cost cuts on education & health services. Other concerns included violence on tv, erosion of moral standards and the breakup of family life.
